::DeathStorm::

"Energy signature detected."

DeathStorm's head jerks up as his ship's computer reports its finding. He 
smiles. Someone to kill....

His smile turns into an evil grin as he hears the bots message. Peace and 
harmony never helped anyone.

DeathStorm takes out his rifle, walking out of his ship and flying off toward 
the new bot's location.
